DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy prize-based contingency management ( CM ) administer exclusively group . Substance dependent patient ( N=360 ) community-based treatment program randomly assign one two condition : ( ) standard , non-CM treatment ( b ) standard treatment plus prize CM delivered group . In CM condition , patient earn opportunity win prize attend group submit drug-free biological specimen . Substance use psychosocial problem measure intake , month 1 , month 3 ( post treatment ) , 6- , 9- , 12-month follow-up evaluation . We also assess patient characteristic may associate improved outcome within across condition .
DOC.brief_title: Group-Based Contingency Management Substance Abuse Treatment - 1
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : age > 18 year current DSMIV diagnosis cocaine , opioid alcohol abuse dependence willing provide breath urine sample 12 week English speak willing sign inform consent Exclusion criterion : serious , uncontrolled psychiatric illness ( e.g. , acute schizophrenia , bipolar disorder , severe psychotic major depression , suicide risk ) dementia ( < 23 Mini Mental State Exam ; Folstein et al . 1975 ) recovery pathological gambling
